ValidationRule.description: The Client Number must be 4 or 8 numbers for records with Request Type = INTERNAL REFERRALS, SPLIT OPPORTUNITY, or COMM AUDIT
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'INTERNAL REFERRALS'),ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'SPLIT OPPORTUNITY'),ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'COMM/AUDIT - ** For Monthly Audit Use Only **')), NOT( OR( REGEX( Client_Number__c , "[A-Za-z0-9]{4}"), REGEX( Client_Number__c , "[A-Za-z0-9]{8}") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid Format - The Client Number must be 4 or 8 numbers, and cannot contain dashes, NPR or XXX
